item.title: Dragon claws
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

This is quite a simple fix.

In your wearing.java, search for:

public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

There will be a huge list of items. Somewhere in this list you will see:

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dragon")) { return 60;

Now, the easiest thing to do is to specify all the dragon armor, to make it like so:

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon chain")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dragon plate")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon full")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dragon med")) { return 60;

That should work.

Read full topic
